Name: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' out of all activity executions in the event log
Metric: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' occurrences across all cases
Metric: Number of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' activities

Name: Percentage of process variants that include 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch'
Metric: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' out of all cases

Name: Number of times 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' is directly preceded by 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation'
Metric: Number of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' activities for cases where activity 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' that occur after 'Manuscript Export Succeeded' in the same case
Metric: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' out of all 'Manuscript Export Succeeded'

Name: Frequency of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' relative to the frequency of 'SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion'
Metric: Number of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' activities for cases where activity 'SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion' occurs

Name: Percentage of cases where 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' appears exactly once
Metric: the average of the function base == 1 where base is the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch'

Name: Number of process variants in which 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' is followed by no further activities (i.e., terminal activity)
Metric: Number of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' activities

Name: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' occurrences that are part of accepted manuscript trajectories (e.g., following 'RW-EIC Accept')
Metric: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' out of all 'RW-EIC Accept'

Name: Frequency of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' compared to the frequency of 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'
Metric: Number of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' activities for cases where activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' that occur within 7 days after 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation'
Metric: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' out of all 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation'

Name: Number of cases where 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' occurs without a preceding 'First Look-Your updates are overdue'
Metric: Number of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' activities for cases where activity 'First Look-Your updates are overdue' does not occur

Name: Percentage of all 'Manuscript Export Succeeded' events that are eventually followed by 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch'
Metric: Percentage of 'Manuscript Export Succeeded' out of all 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch'

Name: Frequency of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' in variants that originate from revised submissions versus original submissions
Metric: Number of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' activities for cases where activity 'Revised Manuscript Submission Confirmation' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' that appear in the final phase of the review process (i.e., after any EIC decision activity such as 'SW-EIC Accept' or 'RW-EIC Accept')
Metric: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' out of all 'SW-EIC Accept'
